parameter.value: Hey |PLAYERNAME|! You came to the right place if you need runes!
You dont have not enough of gold.
I am selling runes. You should buy a few backpacks of explosions while your here, its cheap.
Name a kind. I sell Hmms, Explosions, Gfbs, Firebombs, Sds, Ihs, Uhs, Magic walls, Destroy fields and Blank runes. Wich one would you like?
